AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shaolin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was accepted for training at an ancient Shaolin monastery after [PAWN_possessive] family died to various tragedies. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised by the blind master Po, who became [PAWN_possessive] beloved mentor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wandering monk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: One day, [PAWN_nameDef]'s beloved mentor and elder, Master Po, is murdered by the Emperor's nephew; outraged, [PAWN_nameDef] retaliates by killing the nephew. With a price on [PAWN_possessive] head, [PAWN_nameDef] is forced to flee...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young astrophysicist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A young [PAWN_nameDef] was inspired by a visit to the World's Fair. Seeing all the amazing applications and explorations of science left a deep sense of awe and wonder at the mechanics of the universe. This started [PAWN_possessive] path to astronomy and astrophysics.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Astrophysics professor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Over time, [PAWN_nameDef]'s passion for scientific discovery pushed [PAWN_pronoun] to write a multitude of books and other media devoted to astronomy and astrophysics.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had an average childhood, earning a freighter pilot's license and a position as a Duty Warrant Officer aboard a commercial towing vessel, the Nostromo.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After being diverted to a strange mysterious planet, one of [PAWN_nameDef]'s crewmates was implanted with an alien embryo, which incubated within his body before bursting forth and terrorizing the crew. Over a short period of time, the creature killed [PAWN_nameDef]'s crewmates. After a harrowing series of events, HE managed to eject the stowaway from an airlock and escape.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space trucker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After an average adolescence, [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years roaming the galaxy as a long-haul driver. [PAWN_possessive] off-beat bravado and open nature helped [PAWN_pronoun] make friends in many strange places.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: True hero
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While visiting [PAWN_possessive] old friend Wang on the planet Ching-Dai, bandits kidnap Wang's fiancee, setting off an incredible chain of events. They cross paths with an ancient cursed sorceror, Lo-Pan, who seeks to sacrifice the young girl to break his curse. After a series of chases, battles, and thoroughly shaking the pillars of heaven, [PAWN_nameDef] and Wang save the day - and [PAWN_nameDef] heads back off to his unending journey...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young barky
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a hot southern region, dreaming of becoming a holonet star, or sometimes just Nachos. (Eating them, not becoming them)

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Displaced streamer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] got established as a holonet personality, producing holovids and live holostreams. Somehow, [PAWN_nameDef] ended up here... Don't ask me how!
